LanguageData.AArmoury_NeedToTargetCaster: This ability needs to target its caster
LanguageData.AArmoury_NeedToTargetNotCaster: This ability needs to target someone besides its caster
LanguageData.AArmoury_CantAcceptCategory: Weapon doesn't accept that trait category.
LanguageData.AArmoury_CantGenerateAlone: That trait can't be generated alone.
LanguageData.AArmoury_NoTraits: {0} doesn't have any traits to remove.
LanguageData.AArmoury_RemovedTrait: Weapon trait "{0}" has been removed from {1}. It's gone, Jim.
LanguageData.AArmoury_GunsSupportingTrait: Guns that can use this trait:
LanguageData.AArmoury_NoUniqueEquivalent: {0} doesn't seem to have an unique weapon equivalent.
LanguageData.AArmoury_NotForThisGun: This is a conversion kit for {0}. It won't work on other weapons.
LanguageData.AArmoury_MinWeaponTraitsDesc: By default, unique weapons have a minimum of 1 weapon trait. Changes to this will only affect newly spawned weapons, not existing ones.
LanguageData.AArmoury_MaxWeaponTraitsDesc: By default, unique weapons have a maximum of 3 weapon traits. Changes to this will only affect newly spawned weapons, not existing ones.
LanguageData.AArmoury_SendWeaponPods: Send unique weapon pods every quadrum! (weapon FIESTA!)
LanguageData.AArmoury_SendWeaponPodsDesc: With this option, which is disabled by default, you can choose to get 1-3 drop pods loaded with random unique weapons every 15 days. Note that this can be very OP... or very underwhelming. If you have a caravan spot the weapons will be delivered there.
LanguageData.AArmoury_FiestaDelivered: Drop pods loaded with unique weapons have been delivered to the colony!
LanguageData.AArmoury_AddWeaponsToMoreMercs: Add unique weapons to more Ancient Mercenaries
LanguageData.AArmoury_AddWeaponsToMoreMercsDesc: By default, only the leader in a band of mercenaries will have a unique weapon. With this setting you can make it so ALL of the mercenaries in the quest carry a unique!
LanguageData.AArmoury_AddWeaponsToAllRaids: Add unique weapons to all raids
LanguageData.AArmoury_AddWeaponsToAllRaidsDesc: Raids usually don't spawn with unique weapons, but you can change that with this mod option. Enjoy the absolute chaos!
LanguageData.AArmoury_MakeRaidWeaponsBiocodedDesc: Weapons appearing in raids will be biocoded, so the player will have to fight against MUCH tougher raid, and have no unique weapons as rewards!
